attributes.additional_details:
DLA is the LEAST defrauded benefit or allowance in the system and is also the hardest to qualify for.

The government are trying to cut the amount of people who are eligible for disability benefits/allowances by changing DLA to the new Personal Independence Payment (P.I.P) and making it impossible to get by very dubious medical (sic) tests by non-doctors who work for  ATOS.

DLA is one of the few benefits that actually makes a real difference and should be saved rather than savagely cut.

Save DLA and stop the change to P.I.P
